body: Anyone else struggling to find a good #book to read lately? I need some #bookrecommendations! #reading

comments.body: I just finished 'The Silent Patient.' It’s a psychological thriller with a crazy twist at the end. Highly recommend it!
@34221 That sounds exactly like what I’m looking for! Adding it to my list.
If you’re into fantasy, try 'Mistborn' by Brandon Sanderson. Great world-building and characters. I couldn’t put it down.
@77889 'Mistborn' is amazing! Sanderson’s writing is so detailed. The magic system in that series is super cool too.
@33322 Exactly! The way the magic is tied to metal is so unique. @55512, if you like fantasy, it’s a must-read.
I’m reading 'Sapiens' right now. It’s non-fiction and dives into the history of humankind. If you want something thought-provoking, this one’s for you.
Thanks @66788! I’ve heard a lot about 'Sapiens,' but I wasn’t sure if it would be too dense. What do you think?
It’s definitely detailed, but not overwhelming. The way it’s written is really engaging. It covers a lot, but it’s not a tough read.
If you want something lighter and fun, 'The Rosie Project' is a great rom-com with some quirky characters. A really enjoyable read.
